title: Trump Campaign Strategy, Mattis Critique, 2020
itunes:title: Trump Campaign Strategy, Mattis Critique, 2020
description:
Guests: Justin Sink, Bloomberg White House reporter, Eli Lake, Bloomberg Opinion columnist, Jack Kingston, Former Republican Georgia Congressman, Trump 2020 campaign surrogate, John Gans, former Chief Speechwriter at the Pentagon and author of "White House Warriors: How the National Security Council Transformed the American Way of War."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
